summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the acquisition, for open space, park and recreation purposes, of a portion of Lot 4, Block 5, of what is commonly known as Bell and Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 1 of Plats, page 29, in King County, Washington; authorizing acquisition and acceptance of the deed; authorizing acquisition by condemnation, if necessary; and reducing and reallocating an appropriation made in Ordinances 117100 and 118311.
